        Default count of items to respond to a REST request

        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_REST_RESP_COUNT

        static final int MAX_REST_RESP_COUNT
        Maximum count of items that a REST request can ask for (i.e. /trends/users/500). The default value is 500. This is to stop people from requesting something like this: trends/100000000000.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JAVADOC_ROOT_PATH

        static final java.lang.String JAVADOC_ROOT_PATH
        Javadoc root url path (i.e. the root path for DawsonMyers.ca/docs is "docs").
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JAVADOC_INDEX_FILE

        static final java.lang.String JAVADOC_INDEX_FILE
        Javadoc index.html path.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WEB_APP_ROOT_PATH

        static final java.lang.String WEB_APP_ROOT_PATH
        Web app root url path (i.e. the root path for DawsonMyers.ca/ is "" or "/"). This is the url that bootstraps the web app.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WEB_APP_ROOT_FILE

        static final java.lang.String WEB_APP_ROOT_FILE
        Web app index.html path. This is the file that bootstraps the web app.
        See Also:
